sources.title: "Max In A Taxi" (1917) starring Max Linder and Martha Mansfield
sources.description: This gem is presented by Silent Hall of Fame.   Please visit https://silent-hall-of-fame.org/   to support our non-profit mission and the legacy of silent movie stars by making a tax deductible contribution.   FEEL FREE TO FOLLOW US ON TWITTER @SilentFilmGems   "Max in a Taxi" is a short comedy, included in our program to illustrate the work and contributions of Martha Mansfield, a star of Silent Hall of Fame.  It was her third film ever, and her last of three films with Max Linder for Essanay Studios. Martha Mansfield was 17. metadata.Plot: A wealthy alcoholic is disowned by his father for his drunken behavior. Now penniless, he takes a job as a taxi driver, despite not knowing how to drive
metadata.Actors: Max Linder, Martha Mansfield, Mathilde Comont
